mapper.select: SELECT m.manager_brandname AS manager_brandname, sum((i.item_price * s.sell_amount)) AS brandtotal FROM manager m LEFT JOIN item i ON m.manager_idx = i.re_manager_idx LEFT JOIN sell_detail s ON i.item_idx = s.rf_item_idx WHERE m.manager_adminauth='Y' AND m.manager_del_yn ='N' GROUP BY i.re_manager_idx

SELECT m.manager_brandname AS manager_brandname, DATE_FORMAT(s.sell_pay_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS days, sum((i.item_price * sd.sell_amount)) AS dayTotal FROM manager m LEFT JOIN item i ON m.manager_idx = i.re_manager_idx LEFT JOIN sell_detail sd ON i.item_idx = sd.rf_item_idx LEFT JOIN sell s ON s.sell_idx = sd.RF_SELL_IDX WHERE m.manager_id=#{manager_id} AND s.sell_pay_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND now() GROUP BY s.sell_pay_date;
